title: Kavanaugh Nomination - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 09/27/18
itunes:title: Kavanaugh Nomination - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 09/27/18
description:
Howard Bloom and Dr.John Curtis join George to give both sides of the isle's opinion on Judge Brett Kavanaugh's Supreme Court nomination and the sexual assault allegations surrounding the process.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
